articles.title: Poll: A majority of Americans believe US democracy is in crisis - NPR
articles.description: On the anniversary of the Jan. 6 attack on the U.S. Capitol, a new NPR/Ipsos poll finds that Americans are pessimistic about the future of democracy, as false claims about the 2020 election persist.
articles.content: Insurrectionists loyal to then-President Trump are seen swarming the U.S. Capitol on Jan. 6, 2021, in Washington, D.C. Americans remain bitterly divided over the events that led to the siege on the C… [+7667 chars]

articles.title: Oops! Harry Potter reunion show uses photo of Emma Roberts instead of Emma Watson - CNA
articles.description: The HBO special's small hiccup featured a childhood photo of the American Horror Story actress instead of Hermione Granger herself.
articles.content: Mistaken identity aside, the HBO Max special offered a few revelations regarding the 31-year-old Watson, including how she almost quit her role and having a huge crush on co-star Tom Felton, who play… [+448 chars]

articles.author: Aidan Wondracz
articles.title: Scientists explain why mosquitos bite some people more than others - Daily Mail
articles.description: American entomologist Dan Kline has spent years studying  the insects and believes he has come across important clues to explain their behaviour.
articles.content:
Scientists have revealed why some people are more prone to mosquito bites than others and busted the top myths that claim to keep the blood sucking critters away.
